alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Windham County through 700 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chester to West Wardsboro. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bellows Falls, Londonderry, Townshend, Stratton, Putney, Saxtons River, Westminster, Newfane, West Wardsboro, Windham, Rockingham, Jamaica, Wardsboro, Grafton, Brookline, Athens, North Westminster, Wardsboro Center, Goose City and East Putney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Vermont.
